p: Apart from the challenges faced by these products at systemic level, the introduction of advanced therapy products into clinical practice is often accompanied by practical issues such as the patient’s days of stay in the clinic and/or the requisite specialized staff. This has as a result that the clinic’s management is reluctant to direct the management of these products [ 8]. Additionally, regarding staff selection, clinics that use advanced therapy products are often in the dilemma of selecting experienced staff not only at the clinical level but also at the institutional level due to the limited use of these products into the daily operation of the clinic.
